website_summaries.verdict: The Jaybird Vista true wireless earphones deliver powerful audio performance in a waterproof, gym-friendly build with EQ you can adjust to taste.
pros: Strong audio performance with boosted bass and crisp highs

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely blown away
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace my Bose Soundsport which were coming up for three years old, and I'm blown away. I've used these on a couple of runs now, and for me they beat the ailing Soundsport in every way. The sound quality actually made me "woah" out loud, the fit means I've been on swift 10k runs without having to readjust them once, and battery life is (so far) brilliant. VERY impressed indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mullett

customer_reviews.title: Left bud useless
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are great however the left earbud is pretty much useless after a month of use and I thought it was me but if you look on the community page of their site it seems to be a running problem. My left bud is significantly quieter than the right and if this wasn't the case then I'd say best earphones I have ever used and worth the money but with this discovery I'm very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joebbray98

customer_reviews.title: True wireless is the future when using whilst training
customer_reviews.text: First time I've used true wireless and these exceed my expectations by miles. Got super sweaty on wattbike today and they didn't budge. Sound quality is great. The fact there are no wires and no inline remote that weighs one side down is the biggest win for me. Always have full charge too as stored in battery case. First class product.
customer_reviews.author: Action

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything could be ok but problems start after first use. Begins from charging of left bud. On right was 100% on left 5% after charging left reach 65%. OK, I thought, maybe I should wait all night? In the morning was the same 65%. Then appears connection issues, right one work but left not at all. After the software update, everything died. I couldn`t connect even right one. I do not recommend this product. If you want to spend so much money choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Bose killers!
customer_reviews.text: Im a straight up audiophile. I don't by cheap and twice and tend to stick to the better known/high value brands out there. Took a chance on Jaybird - NOT disappointed! Nice crisp high tones and warm bass to complete the perfect sound. Comfy and light! They destroy the Bose equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Curry

customer_reviews.title: Extremely secure fit.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest worry when buying earbuds for running was 'would they fall out'. I did a 6mile run on and off road, they did NOT at any point feel like they would come out They were extremley comfortable. Highly recommend these if you want a pair of earbuds for running.👍
customer_reviews.author: David J McManus

customer_reviews.title: Superior buds that are worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds for any journey. Great bass, treble and mids are clear. Very comfortable and don’t fall out forget I am wearing them. The case is great small and easy to handle. The app is simple to use and works well. Also like the way they look when wearing them as they don’t stick out much and complement. Love the sound quality separates these from the pre £100 cheaper buds. These should not be confused and are in a different league having owned all sorts of buds that promise great sound. I will happily recommend these
customer_reviews.author: MarkFern

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Had a paid of Jaybird Bluebuds X which served me well for many years but the decreasing battery life warranted buying some news one, and keeping the old as spares. These fit well in my ear even when running. I set them up to turn on/off when taken out/put back in the case which works really well. The only slight niggle is when I’m running I end up pausing instead of double tapping to skip track but it’s only a minor thing. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent on these buds. Issues that I have had are - adjusting the sound to get a decent volume was very hard to do but once found it's easy. I bought these buds to use in the gym however I have yet to find a combination where they fit when jogging. When I walk they are fine. It is very frustrating as the fit was what sold me on these buds.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH ELSTON

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting for a long time for a decent pair of wireless headphones to come out. I was hoping bowers and Wilkins would release similar but the disapointed me with their new release (cable around the neck) bose release earlier sticks to much out of your ears and sony new wf forgot the exact model number to expensive and if im not mistaken not sweat proof. These do the job for me perfect. Gym, walks, studying all good. Sound quality is decent and i never had a problem with battery. Fit is good for my ears and their small and look good. So I’m happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Avoid them if you are looking for a good sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought Bose soundsports and Jaybird Vistas together and I was very excited about Jaybird but once I received it I found that the sound quality isn't good and the buttons located on earphones was making a really annoying sound while clicking. So had to return it. Bose soundsports sound and quality I would say far better than these once. Jaybird please release something good with the price you are asking from customers, these earphones are average and I find that the price is not worth.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Singh

customer_reviews.title: Unreal earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding. I have been searching for some buds that are suitable for workouts whilst still having good sound quality and these hit both so, so well. The sound is full of base and rich, even beating my current set of bose noise cancelling earbuds. They case is miniscule so super convenient for slipping into your pocket. AND THEY STAY IN YOUR EARS. Call quality is also excellent which is rare for bluetooth sets. I honestly can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud useless after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this seriously. They are great WHILE THEY WORK. Which for me wasn't long, the right earbud just suddenly one day started being way more quiet than the left one. I've tried everything, soft reset, hard reset, factory reset, many times over to no avail. Pure garbage, get something that works. This is also not a one off as I've seen plenty of reviews mentioning the same problem. When you go on their website the live chat doesn't work, no email, US phone number no UK offices. Do yourself a favour and don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michal W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved jaybird until these. Thought I had a faulty pair because the voice sounded crackly when the built in voice assistant spoke and music seemed to make weird pop noises at times but my replacement pair had the same issue. Not only this but they are the most uncomfortable silicone tips I've ever tried especially after using memory foam on the x4's... And these don't even have the option for memory foam tips. Disappointing. For £160 I exepected better from this company and now I will have to search for a new pair. I hate to say it but I would avoid these. especially disappointing because the sound quality is so good from jaybird. :(
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, I love the case too. Initially I purchased these for running and the gym with my mobile phone. However, these headphones work really well also with Linux, either Desktop or even Raspberry Pi. To successfully pair with Linux - I found that restarting the Bluetooth daemon helped whilst the Jaybird Vistas are in pairing mode. Very comfortable headphones. Sound is really great. Very glad I am using them. Currently I am using them for music and for studying some online courses. Tip: for keeping the firmware updated, you should pair with your phone and open the Jaybird Vista app.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Potter

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these ear buds. While exercising they stay firmly in the ear. The sound quality really good I would say 4.5 out 5. Although it doesnt have noise cancellation technology, it does extremely well at blocking outside noise. In my opion better than some noise cancellation headphone. I took these on the plane and was very impressed. Try these and you won't be disappointed. My only grip is that it doesnt have volume control and ambient noise pass through.
customer_reviews.author: Reps

customer_reviews.title: Useless after 4 months - firmware issues
customer_reviews.text: So these are the best fitting earbuds I’ve had however after 2 or 3 months the left earbud volume massively dropped and is now almost silent. This issue has been reported multiple times on their website. They advised the latest firmware which makes no difference to this issue. Some have been asked to send them back and that’s that. Waste of time and money. Hugely disappointing as when they worked at first they were brilliant. You expect better for expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and super stable Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are great sounding, once you have customised their sound to your taste using the app. I've been running with them, they never budged at all staying firmly in place. They also connect to my Nokia 8 very quickly and more importantly they stay connected with no drop out of sound at all. Much better connection and sound and everything else than the jaybird 3x that I also own. Sound isolation is ok not great but ok, although I'm comparing them to my Shure 215se earbuds which have amazing isolation. Overall I'm very happy with the Jaybird Vista earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Too much noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: These earphones had really good sound quality, felt really well built and very high end. Unfortunately, upon putting them in, they were far too snug a fit and for me cancelled too much sound. With them not on I could hear my blood pumping, and even whilst sound was playing, any movement or vibration caused a thudding sound due to their tight fit. I tried the difference sized fins provided however this doesn’t adjust how far in to the ear these buds go. Had to return as the thudding really was deafening when moving or running.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I'm glad I did my research!
customer_reviews.text: I've got way too many headphones, but I needed something for the gym. I sweat so much it's not normal, so I wanted something that wouldn't be affected by that and wouldn't fall out. These are absolutely amazing! I researched all the most popular wireless buds and eventually settled on these because of the positive reviews from runners and athletes. I won't go into a long boring review, all I say is if you're after great sounding, waterproof and sweatproof ear buds that that are lightweight and won't fall out, you won't find better.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud far quieter than the left
customer_reviews.text: Edit: firmware update v1.1.5 seems to have fixed the below issue. The right earbud is significantly quieter than the left - a software problem recognised by jaybird in august but still not fixed. The result is that audio sounds like it's coming from the left of my head and its uncomfortable. The problem is definitely not due to fit, the right earbud is simply quieter.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them, spend a little bit more and buy the apple ones
customer_reviews.text: They are a good earbuds for running, they fit in my ears very well, something that I always had problems so in that point I am very happy. Microphone it is not that good, if there's wind, no one can hear you. Also I don't like the button options, there aren't a lot of options in the software. Also other earbuds you have the option to see the battery on the case, not in this earbuds only the battery percentage on the earbuds. Overall, the price is good for the quality and for running. If you want earbuds for daily use better to get ipods.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of earbuds, only good things I could say about them. Battery life is great, they have fast charge, controls are ease and they are comfy to wear (quite light) . Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandar Stosic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday, super pleased with the headphones. Connected to my phone effortlessly ( Moto G7 ), no Bluetooth drop at all, music sounds excellent- I really like the personal EQ on the Jaybird app- it sets the frequencies to just the right levels for your hearing. Very well made, feel and look quality, I left the size 2 ear plugs on and they fitted perfect. Very good noise isolation, the case is ideal for storage and charging. Expensive, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MA Kinsella

customer_reviews.title: They just don't work...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the first pair that I got couldn't pair with my phone or laptop. Both devices could see the headphones, so it was annoying and odd. A replacement set is on the way, and maybe I will change the score if they work... Second pair arrived, and same thing, They won't connect with my phone, work laptop or personal laptop. So basically utterly pointlless. It's a shame, as they feel good in the ear...
customer_reviews.author: Lars Panzerbjørn

customer_reviews.title: Great for running or gym use!
customer_reviews.text: For a while now I've been looking for a decent set of in-ears for running. I had originally bought another brand but I could never get the left ear bud to fit correctly and it would always fall out. So I tried these, I just wish I had bought these first, as it would have saved me a lot of money. The fit is great and when out running they don't move at all. The sound is great quality and the app has some great features like adding extra bass, which makes sound even better. The charging case is sleek and even with the larger size wing tips fitted, they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: No way of controlling volume using earbuds
customer_reviews.text: For a high end set of earbuds seems a massive oversite that there is no way to control volume using the earbuds themselves. Other earbuds use the long hold function for this, these seem to use that to switch the earbuds off. Could just do this when back in the charging pod. They are comfortable and fit well but dont know how designers have missed that trick.
customer_reviews.author: M.Kera

customer_reviews.title: They have everything what u may want from earphones
customer_reviews.text: Got these like a month ago now. Very nice earphones. Very light, good battery . Wearing them at work and after 6h still comfortable. Nice crisp sound . I like the app on the phone where u Can use equaliser to change how they sound. Defo worth the money. Perfect for the gym and fully waterproof u Can even listen to music under the shower. I'm sure there are some earphones that sound much better but not many so good overal .they have everything what u may need
customer_reviews.author: Maciej Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but unreliable secure fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a Christmas present. In February, after 2 months of use jogging every other day, one of the earphones fell out of my husband's ear - when it hit the ground, it broke - one piece he found on the pavement, the other, which was the main body, went into shrubbery. Because of the colour, the body piece blended in with the shrubbery so he couldn't find it to see if it could be repaired. It is back to the buds with the over the ear hook I'm afraid. Quite sorry to have spent so much money for only a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: fizzypetal

customer_reviews.title: Slips out..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since I like bluetooth earbuds and wanted to upgrade to waterproof ones. Unfortunately they slip out of my ears, even with the smallest fitting. I go to push them in and the noise muffles, then they slip out. It wasn't fun riding my bike with them nor taking a bath - I had to be cautious. Though the battery lasts forever, the fact that they are waterproof and I love the case too.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great depth, balanced bass and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had a previous generation of the Jaybird in ear headphones and I was impressed with the sound quality then, by these are honestly a step higher. The amazing quality is still there but now there is also a balanced depth of bass too, really completing the package for me. The part designed to hold them in your ear I feel is not quite as good as the older ones, however for my ears they still work well, which is saying something as most buds usually fall out of my ears. Fantastic product, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tama

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Apple AirPods pro
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought the AirPods pro but they were not very good so returned them. Noise cancellation was poor, sound quality no different than original AirPods. Overpriced. A friend recommended Jaybirds: 1) sound quality is great 2) noise cancellation is much better than pros, you can still hear background noise but it is a lot more muffled and does not require you to increase the volume 3) aesthetically much better looking than the AirPods, which in my opinion look like electronic toothbrushes! Only downside of vista is that it does feel weird in the ear. Highly recommend the Jaybird Vista!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit small ears
customer_reviews.text: Do not fit small ears - even with the smallest size silicone cover and lodging them properly as instructed they kept falling out of my ears. I do have very small ears - would have lived for them to make a smaller insert along the medium and large they provide. From what I could tell, These are good quality, but don’t fit small ears unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Boubal

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Once you’ve paired to your phone, which took me about 5 seconds (iPhone XS), you’re ready to go. Pull the buds out of the teeny tiny box and they connect instantly. They sound great, they block out the outside world really well, they’re extremely comfortable, and no matter how much I shake my head they simply won’t fall out. It will be hard to ever go back to wires.
customer_reviews.author: Dougie

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I have no idea what “moisture wicking” is, but it gets 5 stars anyway. After purchasing a cheaper pair of Bluetooth sport ear buds, I returned them and decided to push the boat out with these. Anything whathifi approved is always a safe bet. These things actually work! Always a bonus I know. Not only that they sound great, are simple to use and fit snuggly in your ears. Can also be paired with tv and computer assuming yours has the capabilities for this. Worth paying the extra money for these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wireless headphones for the gym and going for a run. The sound quality is great, previously had the Plantronics which we pretty nice as well however they are connected to each other. Theses are individual so easier to lose of course but the sound may add again is fantastic and the charge box it comes with is great. Hope they last a few years :) like my Platronics
customer_reviews.author: CHRISB

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, good for sports, average battery life
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these is great and they sit very securely in your ears so there's no fear of them falling out while running or exercising in the gym. The battery life is average so if you're using them all day at work you'll find that they will need charging part way through the day. I also find that I need to take them out of my ears occasionally while running due to them trapping sweat in my ear...not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Wibbler

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports, bad for calls
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have great sound quality and definitely stay in your ear when running, walking, or otherwise. I bought them specifically with going on walks and talking on the phone using Bluetooth with friends and family. Unfortunately, these headphones pick up SO much background noise that I can never talk with others-- a light breeze sounds like a tornado, one car drives by and it sounds like I am in Times Square. Just keep in mind what you will be using these for before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Bad connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, connectivity issues throughout. Press and hold not working as expected in none of the options - Turn on/off or sound up/down. Battery drained easily and then charging not as fast as advertised. The app could rarely see the pair as well. No improvement after hard or soft reset in any environments. Previously used a cheap Bluetooth pair which maintained better connectivity regardless it support of lower bt version. Not sure if this is a faulty pair but do not have the will to try another one to be honest due to the immense frustration with the pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable, nothing more...
customer_reviews.text: Good but as they are air tight in the ear, sound quality can feel underwhelming and they go only just loud enough. Good for use in the gym as they will not fall out. I think they are very overpriced for how they perform, I bagged a like new pair from warehouse with an extra 20% off and still paid £75 which compared to the rrp of around £150 was a good deal, but even at £75 only just about worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Streety

customer_reviews.title: You can’t never go wrong with Jaybird
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using jaybirds for quite some time now and I’m still delighted with the result. I’ve not tried his noise cancellation feature yet but so far It is all good. Also by customising the app features you can double tap one earbud to listen to a song again which is really great. The only downfall is the absence of the repeat/shuffle option on the Jaybird app. I still don’t understand why this hasn’t been resolved yet as it is a key feature for any music player. If they can come up with an update which adds these features, I’d probably say they are the BEST earphones on the market. I’ll highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edo tensei

customer_reviews.title: Best Jaybird earphones yet!
customer_reviews.text: After owning 4 different pairs of Jaybird earphones over the years, these are hands down unequivocally the best ones they’ve made yet. Great sound, great quality, and the small charging case makes it easy to pocket/carry anywhere. Only thing missing is the ability to assign RWD as a function/button and wireless Charing to the case (hopefully in the next version).
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: Absolut great!
customer_reviews.text: Love them - I use them a lot for running and the gym and therefore wanted wireless headphones which have additional features to hold them in place. Love the customisation of the buttons as I am using one to change the volume (which the majority of ear buds don't have!). Looks great in light grey also rather than black, sound quality is very good also (although I mainly hear mainstream as well as piano music) and battery life is what they say. Absolute great product for the price and would highly recommend it to anyone else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic earphones
customer_reviews.text: I trialled these alongside another set of Truly Wireless headphones and they won by a country mile. Securely fitting, better sound quality, better passive noise cancelling and work independently of each other. My choice of gym earphones and my current choice for truly wireless earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Quality highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product - super easy to pair and excellent quality sound. Storage box also recharged and has a helpful magnetic fix to keep the headphones inside. They stay in your ears comfortably for long periods and if required you can use just one. So pleased I’ve bought a second set
customer_reviews.author: Antigone

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few cheaper wireless earphones before these but these are great! The last 2 pairs (of a different product: different manufacturer) broke/ stopped working because I use them in the gym. These claim to be true waterproof and so far so good! As a bonus they never slip in my ear even on a hardcore cross train.
customer_reviews.author: The Hall’s 😎

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great product, pairs extremely well with phone. Very easy to set up and gives a good range of audio outputs. It’s been great to use out in the garden doing my lockdown workout! No wires no fuss! Extremely comfortable and stay put in the ear even during punch bag workout! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best earbuds I've used
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is the second pair of these ive owned. The first pair the left bud became unresponsive, would charge and turn on, no sound. I followed the guidance on the official website did a hard reset several times. Updated the firmware, no hope. There was no way I wasn't getting another pair, with the preset custom EQ on the app enabled these are the most incredible earbuds I've ever owned. I had the bose soundsport 30s with proper noise cancelling, whilst these don't possess true noise cancelling abilities its almost identical. They never fall out even when I am doing back flips in the park. Charge case is awesome, battery life substantial. Defo recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marc alamara

customer_reviews.title: Reliant on good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. The sound is good quality and they go nice and loud if needed. There is no active noise cancelling, so you're reliant on the buds creating a good seal in the ear canal (which they do for me). Battery life is impressive and I don't have to regularly charge the case. Having dropped them a few times, in the case and individually, they're strong and haven't dented or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cave

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wireless earphones
customer_reviews.text: An amazing pair of wireless earphones. They connect to devices easily, and have a fantastic battery life, even without the portable charging case which charges them pretty quickly. The sound quality is amazing, and they fit very well. I use these for running, and they fit securely, despite getting sweaty or running in the rain. They are pricey, but not as expensive as many other earphones, and having bought ‘bargain wireless earphones’ before, these are definitely worth the price in terms of quality and usability. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: I Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: Best ones from Jaybird  :)
customer_reviews.text: Wow... By far these are the best wireless Bluetooth headphones I have ever owned! Compact, comfortable fit, great when running and exercising, IP7, fantastic battery life/playback, excellent sound quality, no cut out, no lag etc etc. I may even buy the black ones :D
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but quite large
customer_reviews.text: These earphones sound great, especially after tailoring the sound through the app. Unfortunately, I have quite small ears, so they stuck out quote a bit and even with the smallest ear tips, they caused a lot of discomfort after wearing for more than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good until they break
customer_reviews.text: Arranged a return and refund. If you get a pair that works, they're a good choice. They worked quite well on my morning jogs for about 10 days. First, the right earbud mysteriously lost battery charge even inside the charging case. Then the right earbud also played sound at a lower volume to the left earbud. I updated the firmware on the buds through the app and also re-paired the Bluetooth connection but the problem persisted.
customer_reviews.author: Morningside Man

customer_reviews.title: Oh YES!! Relieved to find they are even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many friggin headphones and I either have great sound but with a cord which is no good when training, cycling or running or I have had to put up with heavy Bluetooth types that either keep dropping connection or still have a little neck cord or both! I read reviews for these and my only final reservation was they could be too heavy or not fit well but they are MEGA! Well chuffed! I haven’t had them long so now just hope they keep going as I think I’ve finally got the pair I’ve been wanting for years!
customer_reviews.author: T JONES

customer_reviews.title: Loving these!
customer_reviews.text: First ever set of proper wireless buds, loving the sounds, simple charging case, easy to set up etc. Prefer the sound of these to my Shure £250+ headphones and far more convenient. Also, the ear hooks are an absolute must for running, gym and overall comfort in my opinion. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Coin Slot

customer_reviews.title: Best buds for large lugholes!
customer_reviews.text: The only buds that stay firmly in my large ear holes with any workout ! Fantastic sound too for the size.. battery life ok - would be better if I didn’t have them at full volume all the time. Completely noise cancelling-so be careful when near roads etc Can’t fault em!
customer_reviews.author: danny dier

customer_reviews.title: There has never been a time I couldn't use them..
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, great sound, great app. They look great and feel better. Connect to spotify and literally have a sound track to your life as soon as they get take out the box with auto connection. Never come close to falling out your ears which was my worry with wireless earbuds. Super durable and waterproof. IPX 7 means water and dust proof. Not just sweat proof like the majority. They are built to last. And 5 mins back in in boxes for a horse charge. They are truly a great set of buds made for all kinds of lifestyles not just walking about or sat on a bus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in your ear
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review for anything in my life but i simply had to for these. The bluetooth connectivity is great, app is useful and design sleek. But as a previous review said, if you even open your mouth to talk these will fall out. I’m astonished that people say they can run with them! On reflection they are also overpriced. Please don’t waste your money like i just did!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Proven Jaybird sound now truly wireless
customer_reviews.text: I have been with Jaybird since the X3's, and have always loved the sound quality (and bass) that Jaybird offers. After my X4's broke, I wanted to make the jump to truly wireless earbuds. Having tried several other brands, I can say that Jaybird once again smash it. The true wireless freedom of the Vista's come with no compromise to sound. The for fit and sleek case are an added bonus. Chuck in the fact that you can easily adjust the eq and in my opinion you have the perfect earbuds. I think I am a Jaybird fanboy now haha
customer_reviews.author: Alex David Browne

customer_reviews.title: True Wireless Surprise!?
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have really shown how far the technology has come with true wireless coming from previously owning a pair of Bose Soundsports. These are intensely better shining throughout all genres and spoken word. Battery life seems to be consistent and more than enough in one sitting for most activities such as long walks or workouts. Never lost connection in my use. The app brings everything together nicely in a user friendly interface to taylor the sound to your liking. So happy I made the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you can live with limitations
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these as they looked neat and sounded good. Unfortunately there were a few limitations I couldn’t live with. There were constant drop outs in public places and call quality was poor. As a result I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jules M

customer_reviews.title: These don’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated with these. Difficult to comment on the sound or comfort as they dont actually stay in my ears long enough. In fact their dedication to leaving my ears should be commended. I have tried all three of the supplied ear pieces in differing combination and still no joy. Purchased for use while exercising and for me, they are not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good pair of ear buds, and I'm a first time user of them. I'd researched these ones, Bose and Jabra. I read reviews and watched reviews on YouTube and ultimately decided on the Jaybird Vista. They are so light and comfortable, no movement whatsoever. Sound is great, I usually have my earphones near or at full volume but I had to turn these down! The set up is easy. I really liked the personalise EQ option. The connection hasn't dropped once so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Preety good earbuds and they do their job. Minuses-limited controls from the app, worst Bluetooth ever- keeps breaking all the time or loosing connection with one of the earbuds. Im also not convinced how they hold in my ears. I had sony walkman before and never had a feeling that i could loose them. Although, the sound and quality is good, due to the numbers of cons my overall mark is 3. Do some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Karol

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: If you run these are brilliant. Super secure, comfortable and the battery life is really good.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple of months, then one of the buds stopped recharging - contacted Jaybird and followed all their instructions, but made no difference. They said to return the product, but outside of Amazon's product return window, so a complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: J Goulden

customer_reviews.title: Superb for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Pairs with the phone super fast when you take them out of the box. No interference, drops or lags. The earbuds can be used individually if you are inclined to do so. Great sound that you can personalise using the app. I use them at the gym where they've survived very sweaty sessions.
customer_reviews.author: JBG

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good comfortable fit Stays in place even when working out Sound quality is very good, took time to set up via app for my liking Battery life is excellent I do like this level of passive noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hughes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I lost my Bose sound sports In summary - fit well - including running - good sound (more detail than the Bose) - seem good for calls - like that you can find them with the app if you loos them . - snazzy little case. - small and discrete - no active noise cancellation but been on a flight and are pretty good. - controls pretty easy to master Hope I don't loose these ones !
customer_reviews.author: si

customer_reviews.title: Practical and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my (more expensive) Sony buds kept falling out of my ears, and I got fed up with them. Sound and noise cancelling not quite as good as the Sonys, but still good. - And they stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for gym only
customer_reviews.text: I would only use these for gym, as they are a good fit and stay put in the ear. Sound quality needed improvement, which is where the equalizer steps in but overall it is no match for the Sony or Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: AllThingsAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely designed for running
customer_reviews.text: Pros +Almost the best sound quality of the wireless earbuds I've tried +Good controls (provided firmware is updated and buttons are customised) +Fit very firmly, won't come out when running Cons -Due to firm fit can get a bit uncomfortable -Especially uncomfortable when pressing buttons
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Empty Box
customer_reviews.text: Received the box headphones not in it.... Went to Amazon who then said I had to wait up to 48 hours to get an update from the team who deals with this....rubbish. They issued me with a refund which will take 5-7 business days without even giving me the option to choose what I'd like to do.. I wouldn't have minded so much if it wasn't a present for someone....terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Can do better with sound quality. Great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with the product. Connects well and doesn't fall off the ear. Great sound but they could have done better with sound, as even after I have used the jbird app it hasnt reached my satisfaction. Love the colour though.
customer_reviews.author: Eram G.

customer_reviews.title: Greateeeee
customer_reviews.text: Worth buying expensive. After trying 3 different pairs of buds and struggling with the fit or the quirkinesses of them. I have find the ones that I can live with. You can use one at a time. Excellent for listening to the radio and continue to listen to the world with the other ear, Sound is good and battery life is good. Can’t find any faults at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: JHILL

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Fitbit Ionic
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product but unfortunately I'm unable to use it correctly with my fitbit ionic and it is a shame that neither fitbit not jaybird are sorting this out
customer_reviews.author: Luca C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent (although I'm no audiophile). The app is also very well thought out and features like tracking the buds and bring able to configure the controls are great additions. Noise isolation isn't the best with background noise quite audible during quiet parts of songs although I'm yet to try out other sized buds. Didn't budge during a 50 minute run - really glad I picked these.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Mullings

customer_reviews.title: Great all round wireless in-ear earphones
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair, great battery life, decent sound, nice and comfortable, handy pause buttons in both earphones. I’ve had lots of wireless in-ear earphones and Jaybird are the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Stay in your ear when running!
customer_reviews.text: I'd read the reviews and thought I'd give them a go. I wanted something for running that were cooler than my big headphones! These stayed in my ears and I didn't have to touch them at all when running. Very pleased with them. The case is very cute and they charge in the case. The charging wire is very short but I guess it can.t get tangled. Would recommend for sports
customer_reviews.author: Hen

customer_reviews.title: Jay bird vista
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them! They stay in! Right ear is perfect fit and left ear he’s working on! Different ear shapes ! Cancels background noise! So need to be aware of surroundings
customer_reviews.author: Girliepinx

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with a great fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is really good and even if you listen on 30% volume you can barely hear other people talking around you. Would recommend as they’re totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hristo Anastasov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent equipment. Recommend you purchase this.
customer_reviews.text: Brillant sound quality. These are not advertised as sound cancelling so no surprises there. Reproduction very good and compensates well for any external noise. Set up is easy and Bluetooth connection works quickly every time. No sound drop out has been experienced by me. Very snug fit in the ear through all exercise. Great purchase 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: I’m a big fan!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a couple of other brands and non compared to my old and accidentally washed Jaybirds. Great sound, clever app to control sound and all in all great quality. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John Deslauriers

customer_reviews.title: Good sound let down by connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent sound, good noise cancelation, the microphone rather good but constant bluetooth problem, crackling sound, dont buy untill they improve their quality
customer_reviews.author: Jacek

customer_reviews.title: Great performance.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance and fit, far superior to the Jabra elite ones I had prior...would recommend to anyone using in an active or relaxed environment 100%.
customer_reviews.author: darren atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Having tried various Bluetooth in ear earphone, most have had poor battery life/ comfort/ fell out while training, these have worked out very well. They are comfortable and stay in ear well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but doesn’t stay in ear
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these because I wanted an in-ear headphone and reviews were great. The sound and noise cancellation is perfect. I was disappointed, however, because these do fall out of your ear if you’re sweating. I would not recommend for running or high intensity workouts where you break a good sweat. Great though for low impact, heavy lifts perhaps. P
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely yes!! So pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely yes!! I’m they’re brilliant! I have a pair of Jabra Elite’s too but these are far superior, they fit better and stay put better whilst running and exercising. They’re spot on
customer_reviews.author: F. Doran

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these Do not judge until you use app and set the eq
customer_reviews.author: robert devenport

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic earphones, mic not great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earphones. These are particularly good for sport. They stay in the ear without any issues. The only drawback is the microphone which isn't great, I find it's best to leave one earphone in and hold the other in front of your mouth for clearer sound quality during calls.
customer_reviews.author: Sudsy

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Sound quality is an amazing improvement from the wired apple earphones I was using before. Love the compact nature, and damn they are solid mine got ran over by a car and the case and earphones still work just some minor cosmetic damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rubin Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Brill!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of running and have never found a pair of earphones that actually stay in my ears due to having a few piercings most earphones fall out. I find myself constantly putting earphones back in throughout a run but not with these! Amazing! Fit perfectly in my ear even around my piercings. The sound is brilliant too. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Verity Glover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earbuds. Despite not being noise cancelling they do block out most noise. Video audio delay is non-existant for Prime and Netflix. There is a lag for downloaded videos but VLC player allows you to delay/speed the audio so it's easily resolved. Fit perfectly and don't move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Sound good but not great for small ears
customer_reviews.text: The earphones sound great and stay in your ears well . They look fantastic, have a nice case and charge quickly. Unfortunately they were painful to wear in my moderately small ears and left them feeling sore (using any of the ear gels) Everything about them was great but beware if you have small ears as these may not be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Good for sports or everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Good sound For the price, nice case, decent battery life, they stay in your ears no matter what. They could have better button controls They could have made better ear tips, or given foam tips.
customer_reviews.author: Bluecat786

customer_reviews.title: Poor returned two of these due to corrosion
customer_reviews.text: Sadly worked very well during rigorous exercise, but quickly deteriorated as twice contacts corroded
customer_reviews.author: B. S. Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: At the time I felt it was the best price for quality and didn’t disappoint. Great sound and natural noise cancellation, no issues with running and sweating. I had them for 6 months and one earbud just stopped working with sound not coming out. I wish their site had more info about it but their customer service was smooth and quick to send a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit, ideal for cardio workouts
customer_reviews.text: These are ace. Use these for running Every day and they’re an incredibly secure fit and decent sound quality. Noise cancelling is not superb, but if I’m honest I think that’s a bonus when using them for outdoor activities. You’re more aware of your surroundings and the sound quality isn’t compromised but the lack of noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and excellent quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent response from Amazon when first order was stolen. Headphones are brilliant, easy to use and comes with accessories. The best pods we have had- this is now our second set. Take good care of the charging system as without this functioning- the headphones will not charge. Can buy replacement however from the website.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I received these today, I had the older X2’s previously and the sound difference is breathtaking! They sound great, look great, sit in my ears great, handle calls great, they’re just great. Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Clark

product_meta.title: Jaybird Vista True Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with Charging Case - IPX7 Waterproof and Sweatproof Earphones, 16 Hour Playtime Siri Enabled In-Ear Earbuds for Sport, Running, Fitness, Gym - Black
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Headphones OnlyFeeling The flow, lost in the moment, in the zone - whatever you call that place that lies beyond limits, built Vista to help you go, but never go quiet. The lightest, most compact and most advanced headphone ever made, Vista provides uncompromising, totally wireless music for athletes. It gives you six hours of audio on a full charge, Plus 10 more in the charging case, with a five-minute quick Charge offering an hour of playtime. Vista, along with its always-ready, stash able charging case, offers premium sound quality and an earth-proof IPX7 construction that allows you to weather any workout.
feature_bullets: True Wireless - Bluetooth connection with JBS1 true wireless technology ensures crystal-clear, lag-free sound for music, video and calls, and a stable and reliable connection to your phone
Personalized Sound - The Jaybird app with personalized EQ allows you to tune the headphones to your ears, giving you a sound that's completely custom to you
Stays Put - Three sizes of interchangeable ear gels ensure a secure, ultra-comfortable fit that feels weightless in your ears during intense activity. Frequency band: 2.4 GHz

Always ready - Jaybird Vista gives you six hours of audio on a full charge, plus 10 more in the ultra-compact charging case, with a five-minute quick Charge offering an hour of playtime, independent bud use extends total power to 32 hour
Ultra-durable - Fully water and sweat-proof IPX7 construction ensures Vista can withstand any workout or weather condition
Compact Charging Case - The compact, low-profile case makes carrying and charging the Vista True Wireless headphones effortless
Custom Controls - Customize the button controls inside the Jaybird App to activate voice assistant, volume control, change track or power on/off

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
